title: ghgtools
text: GHG inventory entity can summarized follows: Assets, buildings, vehicles, equipment, engage Activities, electricity consumption, travel, purchasing, specific Emission Factor tells us rate activity generates GHG emissions. three variables - assets, actives, emission factors - compose underlying calculation methodology. ghgtools uses set standardized data templates match record activity data emission factor using information assets. methodology built best practices set forth GHG Protocol Corporate Standard. following data sets required use ghgtools calculate GHG emissions. library(ghgtools), data sets available. Emission Factor Library - EFLibrary - catalog emission factors variety activities. team consolidates emission factors collection reputable sources, EPA’s Emission Factor Hub. Unless want add custom emission factors (certainly can, tools open source !), don’t need worry emission factor library. pre-populated ready go. Asset Portfolio - AssetPortfolio - list assets. likely includes buildings vehicles. may also designate Enterprise asset calculate scope 3 emissions purchasing, business travel, supply chain related activities. Activity Data - ActivityData - record energy consumption GHG-producing activities across assets.

title: ghgtools
text: First, need load ghgtools emission factor library, EFLibrary, loaded ghgtools package. row data greenhouse gas produced activity. example, burning natural gas generate CO2, CH4 N2O. EFLibrary loaded library ghgtools. ghgtools comes templates activity data asset portoflio. can use create_templates() write templates excel files working directory. create_templates() also writes full emission factor library excel file working directory. Activity Data Template Asset Portfolio Template core function ghgtools ghg_inventory(). function requires activity data, asset portoflio, GWP selection.may choose provide emission factor library, otherwise ghg_inventory() default internal emission factor library EFLibrary Activity Data must data frame following structure activity data template. Asset Portfolio must data frame following structure asset portfolio template. GWP choose global wamring potential use GHG inventory calcualtions. Choices “SAR”, “AR4”, “AR5”, “AR6”. preference GWPs, recommend following UNFCCC guidelines, require use GWP values IPCC’s Fifth Assessment Report (AR5). Emission Factor Library must data frame following structure EFLibrary. may custom unique emission factors wish use ghgtools, case can load emission factor library r studio. may also append additional emission factors onto default EFLibrary. may prefer use excel overwrite activity data asset portfolio data templates data. create_templates() writes excel file working directory. add data templates, can use fread() function create global environment variables use ghgtools. decide make changes emission factor library, use fread() create global environment variable. variables created , can run ghg_inventory(). Let’s take look ghg inventory calculated: ghg_inventory() merged AssetPortoflio, ActivityData, EFL generate GHG emissions inventory report. Let’s take quick look might visualize data.
code: library(ghgtools) create_templates() #> [1] "Success! Check your directory for ActivityData.csv, AssetPortfolio.csv, and EFLibrary.csv" library(data.table) My_ActivityData <- fread("ActivityData.csv") My_AssetPortfolio <- fread("AssetPortfolio.csv") My_EFLibrary <- fread("EFLibrary.csv") GHG_rawdata <- ghg_inventory(My_ActivityData, My_AssetPortfolio, "AR5", My_EFLibrary)

title: Authors and Citation
text: Brandon McNamara. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: McNamara B (2024). ghgtools: Standardized GHG Accounting. R package version 0.0.3, https://brandon-mcn.github.io/ghgtools/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ghgtools: Standardized GHG Accounting},   author = {Brandon McNamara},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.3},   url = {https://brandon-mcn.github.io/ghgtools/}, }

title: Standardized GHG Accounting
text: ghgtools designed make greenhouse gas (GHG) accounting accessible standardized. Tracking, measuring, reporting GHG emissions essential understand risks identify opportunities related climate change transition towards renewable energy economy. goal package advance practice GHG accounting tools rooted uncompromising transparency, rigorous data quality, purposeful versatility.

title: Standardized GHG Accounting
text: can install development version ghgtools GitHub :

title: Standardized GHG Accounting
text: Read Get Started learn use ghgtools.

title: Activity Data Template — ActivityData
text: template activity data used ghgtools. must follow template structure order ghgtools function properly.

title: Activity Data Template — ActivityData
text: data frame 36 rows 12 columns: asset_id Required input. Must alpha-numeric. Must match AssetID Asset Portfolio. supplier Optional input. Name utility vendor supplier. account_number Optional input. Account number utility service. meter_number Optional input. Meter number utility service. date Optional input. Date service activity. used, must short date format, .e. 04/16/1993. year Required input. Year service activity. cost Optional input. Cost activit service. Must numeric. service_type Required input. Must match service type emission factor library. service_subcategory1 Optional input. used, must match service_subcategory1 eission factor library. service_subcategory2 Optional input. used, must match service_subcategory2 eission factor library. unit Required input. Must match unit service type emission factor library. usage Required input. amount activity service.

title: Asset Portfolio Template — AssetPortfolio
text: template asset portfolio used ghgtools. must follow template structure order ghgtools function properly.

title: Asset Portfolio Template — AssetPortfolio
text: data frame 12 rows 12 columns: asset_id Required input. Must alpha-numeric. asset_id primary key activity data. address Optional input. Address asset. city Optional input. City asset. state Optional input. State asset. zip Required input USA. Must numberic 5-digit zip code. Zip code required selecting correct emisison factor electricity USA. country Required input. Country asset. sqft Optional input. Square feet buildings. Must numeric value. region Optional input. Can value. buisness_unit Optional input. Can value. asset_type Required input. Must match asset type Ecat_lookup table. asset_subtype Required input. Must match asset subtype Ecat_lookup table. year_built Optional input. year asset built.

title: Emission Factor Library — EFLibrary
text: Emission factors organized single record data relevant greenhouse gas.

title: Emission Factor Library — EFLibrary
text: data frame 33,421 rows 18 columns: ef_source Emission factor source. ef_publishdate Emission factor publication date. ef_activeyear Year emission factor active GHG reporting. service_type Name fuel activity generates emissions. Must match servicd type activity data. unit Unit service type activity data provided. emission_category Category emissions, e.g., mobile, stationary, indirect energy. service_subcategory1 Optional input. used, must match service_subcategory1 activity date service_subcategory2 Optional input. used, must match service_subcategory2 activity date supplier Optional input. Supplier service type. emission_scope Scope emissions, .e., scope 1, 2, 3. country Used specify country emission factor. subregion Used specify sub-region electricity emission factors. ghg greenhouse gas procued service type. ghg_unit greenhous egas unit. matches unit provided emission factor source documentation. source_emission_factor emission factor source units. unit_conversion ghgtools requires emission factors kg ghgs. ghg_unit must converted kg using unit conversion. conversion_factor ghg unit conversion factor. ghg_perunit Emission factor kg ghg per service type unit.

title: Global Warming Potentials — GWPs
text: Details...

title: Global Warming Potentials — GWPs
text: data frame 7,240 rows 60 columns: country Country name iso2, iso3 2 & 3 letter ISO country codes year Year

title: Global Warming Potentials — GWPs
text: <ghgtools.io>

title: co2e_efl — co2e_efl
text: function consolidates returns emission factor library based selection global warming potentials (GWPs). preference GWPs, recommend following UNFCCC guidelines, require use GWP values IPCC's Fifth Assessment Report (AR5).

title: co2e_efl — co2e_efl
text: GWP Select GWPs. Enter quotation marks function. Choices "SAR", "AR4", "AR5", "AR6" EFL Emissions Factor Library organized according template. Defaults EFLibrary

title: co2e_efl — co2e_efl
text: emission factor library CO2e values based GWP selection.

title: create_templates — create_templates
text: function creates activity data asset portfolio templates CSV files project directory.

title: create_templates — create_templates
text: activity data, asset portfolio templates, full emission factor library

title: eGRID Subregion Lookup — eGRIDlookup
text: Details...

title: eGRID Subregion Lookup — eGRIDlookup
text: data frame 7,240 rows 60 columns: country Country name iso2, iso3 2 & 3 letter ISO country codes year Year

title: eGRID Subregion Lookup — eGRIDlookup
text: <ghgtools.io>

title: ghg_inventory — ghg_inventory
text: Calculates GHG inventory using input data EF_Library, Asset_Portfolio, Activity_Data variables global environment.

title: ghg_inventory — ghg_inventory
text: AD Activity Data organized according template. AP Asset Portfolio organized according template. GWP Select GWPs. Enter quotation marks function. Choices "SAR", "AR4", "AR5", "AR6". EFL Emissions Factor Library organized according template. Defaults EFLibrary

title: ghg_inventory — ghg_inventory
text: GHG raw data
